column4: 8800gtx is running hot..78C  and fan speed is at minimum..and i have no idea how to turn it up in ubuntu..Halp!
nvclock can control fan speed, not sure it the 8xxx series up supported yet
its in the repositories, but you might need to get the 0.8beta2 version from their website
run 'nvclock_gtk'
dont expect great things.
never said there was :D read the man pages on nvclock
are you certain its running that hot?
what does nvclock -i say about the temp?
no 'Sensor Info' box?
what version of nvlock are you using?
ahh ok.

really, youll need the whole cvs.
